body_html:
With log enabled, here is the actual issue:

2018-01-14 17:59:43.561411: E tensorflow/core/lib/gif/gif_io.cc:86] Can't process optimized gif.
2018-01-14 17:59:43.642173: E tensorflow/core/lib/gif/gif_io.cc:86] Can't process optimized gif.

I think it make sense to at least propagate the error message to the exception information. Created a PR #16113 so that can't process optimized gif shows up in the exception thrown.

body:
With log enabled, here is the actual issue:
```
2018-01-14 17:59:43.561411: E tensorflow/core/lib/gif/gif_io.cc:86] Can't process optimized gif.
2018-01-14 17:59:43.642173: E tensorflow/core/lib/gif/gif_io.cc:86] Can't process optimized gif.
```

I think it make sense to at least propagate the error message to the exception information. Created a PR #16113 so that `can't process optimized gif` shows up in the exception thrown.
